data: SELECT * FROM tuga_treemenu WHERE seq >= (SELECT seq FROM tuga_treemenu WHERE id IN (SELECT parentid FROM tuga_treemenu WHERE id = {codigo})) ORDER BY seq

dependencies.data: SELECT DISTINCT rol FROM tuga_rolesaplicaciones WHERE aplicacion IN (SELECT id FROM tuga_treemenu WHERE seq >= (SELECT seq FROM tuga_treemenu WHERE id IN (SELECT parentid FROM tuga_treemenu WHERE id = {codigo})))
